title: Revenue generated by Rovio Entertainment 2010 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013 to 2010.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2013.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2017.
gold: The statistic presents the annual revenue generated by Rovio Entertainment worldwide from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , the developer of a popular mobile game - Angry Birds - generated 281 million euros in revenue .
